About Me

Currently working for The Walt Disney Company in Orlando, supporting Labor Systems as an intern.

Programming for the last 6 or so years, my strengths include ReactJS, Java, Python, and JavaScript.

My recent programming research and practice has been in React applications using Recharts to create graphs for big data pertaining to my senior design project. Outside of school I have been interested in song lyric generation from RNN algorithms based on the discographies of my favorite artists, as well as sports predictions using ML.

Outside of programming, I'm a huge basketball fan, I play a LOT of Rocket League and Overwatch, and I follow sumo wrestling religiously.

Just taking things one day at a time, learning as I go to try and be the best programmer and person I can be.
